message.body: So, Nakul has a ########### laying beside his bed. Definitely not from us. Not sure how to feel. I mean, I don't own him or have any right to feel jealous. I ju
st wish he wouldn't pull the "I only have eyes for you" kind of shit if he's going to do that. I hate feeling misled/lied to.
there's something not right about this situation. if he, like, invited you to go over to his place when he wouldn't be there, wouldn't he be expecting you to see that shit?
Don't feel obligated to reply to me right now if you're in the middle of a cuddle sesh. But yeah, I'm really freaked out by the whole situation. I felt like eve
rything was too good to be true from the beginning, and I was starting to let go of that and trust him, and now I just want to run away from the whole thing.

it's alright. i can't believe him. like, we vaguely anticipated this happening, but he chose, like, literally the weirdest time. i mean, you can't run. communication has to happen, as incredibly awkward as it may be. when is he coming home?
Like 10am. Honestly, I would probably just say fuck it and just put my guard back up without saying anything, but I have to explain to him why I'm not coming to
maybe don't make any real choices without talking to him. it would be perfectly reasonable for you to leave and go back to his place later if you needed to, though.
yeah, it's really confusing... like, seriously.
